name: Buddy Hoagies Steak & Grill Restaurant (Heartland Mall)

reviews.text: Chanced upon this place while looking for a place to have dinner with my friends. Quality of food is slightly better than Aston and price is competitive too. Will definitely revisit with my wife and daughter to try out their Rosti. I ordered the seafood platter, upgrade to a meal and had their Tiramisu for dessert. the Tiramisu was an 8.5/10 for me.

The shredded rosti was an absolute delight! Perfectly crisp on the outside and soft on the inside, it had a wonderful texture that paired beautifully with its rich, buttery flavor. Each bite was satisfying and well-balanced, making it a dish I thoroughly enjoyed. Simple yet so well-executedâ€”definitely a must-try!

The service was great, and the food was delicious. The prices were reasonable, and the dining environment was pleasant with air conditioning. Overall, it was a great experience, and I highly recommend it.

Went there after lunch about 3 pm and the crowd was gone. Ordered a fillet and the sauce is salted egg for a change. It is done perfect and I love the baked potato. There is free coffee or tea before 4pm. In addition, the restaurant does not charge GST! This is awesome! ðŸ¤©

Lots of ala carte food choices from the menu (beef, pork, chicken, fish etc) as well as their sets (with soup, bread and hot drink).
All delicious and at pocket-friendly prices!
Rather noisy though, especially during peak hours.
Seating arrangement was comfortable enough.
Staff were helpful and efficient.
